me

I’ve been tinkering with computers since I was 10 years old and I built my first computer at 11 (thank you Dad) and the rest is history. I am always learning and adding something new to my toolbox. My primary areas of interest include programming, networking, and distributed systems.

When I’m not programming

Alongside my interests in software engineering, IT security, & online privacy, some of my other interests & hobbies include:

  • Livable Cities (!!)
  • Astrophotography
  • Soccer
  • Biking
  • Chess
  • Architecture
  • Timepieces
  • Entrepreneurship
